links.title: U.S. postpones steel tariff decision for U.S. allies until June 1
links.description: Stock Markets 5 minutes ago (Apr 30, 2018 08:20PM ET) ¬© Reuters. FILE PHOTO: Steel Rectangular Tubular Profiles are pictured at Kalisch Steel factory in Ciudad Juarez WASHINGTON (Reuters) - President Donald Trump has postponed a decision on imposing steel and aluminum tariffs on Canada, the European Union and Mexico until June 1, and has reached an agreement in principle with Argentina, Australia and Brazil, a source familiar with the decision said on Monday.

links.title: John Rubino - The Silver Tsunami Is Coming #3962
links.description: John and I have been talking for years about the coming pension crisis. And now it's almost here. 100's maybe even 1000's of government entities are in trouble.They won't be able to meet their bloated pension commitments. This will increasingly lead to municipal bankruptcies.

links.title: DirecTV Now extends free Apple TV 4K promotion with 3 months of prepaid service, get both for as little as $105
links.description: DirecTV has once again extended its popular free Apple TV 4K promotion with three months of prepaid DirecTV Now service. Plans start at $35 per month, making the 32GB Apple TV 4K with service as low as $105.

$AAPL https://iphone.appleinsider.com/articles/18/04/30/apple-grew-44-in-india-generating-half-the-revenues-but-10x-the-profits-of-xiaomi-vivo-oppo-in-fy-2017

links.title: Apple grew 44% in India, generating half the revenues but 10x the profits of Xiaomi, Vivo, Oppo in FY 2017
links.description: Apple's Fiscal Year 2017 (ending in March) revenues in India grew YoY by 17 percent and its profits in the subcontinent grew by 44 percent, despite intense competition from Samsung and a series of Chinese makers working to flood the emerging nation with cheap smartphones.
